entity.name: RedmineBatch

integer.name: redmineSynchronizationDirectionSelect
integer.title: Direction of the synchronization
integer.help:
Determines the direction of the synchronization:
  • Import from Redmine: data of AOS is updated with data from Redmine
  • Export to Redmine: data of Redmine is updated with data from AOS
  • Export and import: export and then import are performed
